review: I have been buying the Avery Economy View Binders for years.  They have been increasingly difficult to find in retail stores.  I purchased the notebooks from Amazon, but when I received them, they did not have the same label that are on the one's in the stores, in fact there was no label on the spine of the notebook.  They did not appear to be of the same quality as the one's that I purchase in the retail stores.  I purchased one in a retail store after purchasing from Amazon and I just don't think they are the same notebook.  Very disappointed. I didn't send them back because I needed them! They are okay, but I would have preferred them to look just like the one's I purchase from retail establishments.
productTitle: Avery Economy View Binder with 2-Inch Round Ring, White, Pack Of 4 (19202)
